title: T206 Downey Polar Bear Miscut PSA -NEW PRICE

posts.post_title: T206 Downey Polar Bear Miscut PSA -NEW PRICE
posts.post_content:
There is a sliver of another back showing on the back.  The front is nicely centered though.  The front looks dark due to a WST of a Polar Bear back.

$40
